Package combinations

This package implements both combination checkers and rules to be used in video poker strategies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CombinationChecker
    Interface for checking if an array of cards corresponds to a combination
    Rule
    Interface to fetch a list of cards from an array of cards needed for a given draw
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ace
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains an Ace
    AKQJunsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains AKQJ Suited (same suit)
    Combination
    Combination class
    Flush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Flush
    Four2_4
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Four of a Kind of low cards (from 2 to 4)
    Four5_K
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Four of a Kind of cards from 5 to K
    FourAces
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains Four Aces
    FourOfAKind
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a generic Four Of a Kind
    FourToInsideStraight
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Four to an Inside Straight
    FourToOutsideStraight
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Four to an Outside Straight
    FourToStraightFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Four to an Straight Flush
    FullHouse
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Full House
    HighPair
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a High Pair (Jacks or Better)
    JackQueenOrKing
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a J, Q or K
    JTsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains JT suited (same suit)
    KJunsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains KJ suited (same suit)
    KQJunsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains KQJ Unsuited
    KQunsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a KQ Unsuited
    KTsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains KT suited (same suit)
    LowPair
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Low Pair (from 2 to T)
    NToFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains an N to Flush
    NToRoyalFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains an N to a Royal Flush
    Occurrences
    Class to easily access number of card rank and suit occurrences in a given hand
    QJunsuitedOrSuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a QJ suited or unsuited
    QTsuited
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a QT suited
    RoyalFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Royal Flush
    Straight
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Straight
    StraightFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Straight Flush
    ThreeAces
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains Three Aces
    ThreeOfAKind
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Three of a Kind
    ThreeToFlushNHighCards
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Three to Flush with N high cards
    ThreeToStraightFlush
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains a Three to a Straight Flush (all 3 types)
    TwoPair
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains Two Pairs
    TwoSuitedHighCards
    Class to verify if an array of cards contains Two Suited High Cards
    Utils
    Generic utilities used by several rules

Package combinations Description

This package implements both combination checkers and rules to be used in video poker strategies.
Author:
